review: Doctor patiently explained the issue and provided short term and long term options. Staff was very helpful and called multiple times before appointment to check.

I visited the doctor for the first time today for the removal of my wisdom tooth.i was very much scared in the beginning as my previous doc whom I consulted she scared me to the peak about complications.
But when i visited Dr.Shyam he explained the procedure and gave me confidence, within 5min of time entire procedure was done with extra care.
He kept me under observation for 25min to monitor my bleeding and sent me back home with extra precautions which i need to take.
He made my complex teeth issue look easy and i am very much fine.
I was very scared . My upper wisdom was half decayed.  I dint feel the pain at all after treatment medication has also helped me recover faster.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Tooth Extraction,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
The consultation is for mother who is an elderly lady. We visited for tooth ache, and were immediately very comfortable for doctor with the way he explained the issue and provided us the treatment plan. Affected tooth needed root canal, but since it was infected, doctor cleared off the pus first and later on next visit completed the RCT. The procedure was almost painless which was surprise to us as we had heard RCT is usually very painful procedure. My mother over time due to improper care and lack of treatment had developed issues in multiple teeth. Since doctor was so efficient and friendly we proceed to go for complete treatment, which included multiple tooth extractions, 2 RCT, placement of bridges and implant.
Its been now close to 3 months since we are following up with Dr. Shyam and we were never let down by him. Most of complicated procedures were done so efficiently that it was almost painless. 
We are nearing end of treatment and will now wait for couple of months before getting implant for missing tooth.
My mother is much better condition now and her eating capability have significantly improved.
I would like to thank doctor and his staff for all good work, friendliness and making treatment so easy and comfortable for both patient and family.
reply_text: Thank you for an exhaustive review. I am very happy for you and your mother. Going forward too I shall make sure she feels comfortable.

context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: I visited Dr. Shyam for wisdom tooth extraction and RCT in 2 teeth. All procedures were absolutely painless! He was quite assuring and addressed my fears regarding procedures (I have had difficult experience with other dentists in the past).

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am writing this feedback  7 months after my first visit to Dr. Shyam.
Before I visited Dr. Shyam, I had consulted many other doctors for my bleeding gums problem over the last 3 yrs and every doctor suggested me to get the flap surgery done , which I was not comfortable with and continued to live with my bleeding problem.
Dr, Shyam after analysing suggested me to go through deep cleaning along with treating the infection. He made it clear that my problem can be easily solved with good oral hygiene as suggested by him. He was upfront in telling me to visit him next only if I follow the  oral hygiene steps as suggested by him else it's of no use.
I visited him 3 times and am following his advice to the core.
 It has been 7 months and no bleeding at all.
I would recommend Dr. Shyam to everyone who is looking for a genuine doctor in today's  world!
Thank you doc!
reply_text:
Thank you very much. 
Prevention is always better than the cure. Glad you are following my advice.

context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Crowns,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Shyam's Vignesh Dental Clinic for couple of years now, for multiple issues related to teeth. Had a pleasant and satisfactory experience during every visit. Dr. Shyam is very considerate regarding the appointments and makes sure all patients are attended to based on their convenience. He patiently explains the root cause and the resolution. They have dedicated orthodontist for braces, a surgeon for wisdom tooth extraction and friendly staff to guide through post procedure do's and don'ts. Would recommend the clinic for any dental procedures.
reply_text: Thank you very much for an in-depth review. Blessed to have wonderful patients like you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It was a very very good experience and I would be continuing with him for other teeth. I had to take a break as I will not be in Bangalore for coming few months. 
Let me summarise my experience before I resume again. We had around 7 seatings including one for strain cleaning. Dr. Shyam Padmanabhan will answer all your queries and you could sense his experience in his answers. He seemed to me, like a professional at work. The waiting is almost negligible if you reach as per the appointment. He operates and explains and everything goes very smooth. They are always available for their patients. 
Overall I would say I am extremely happy and upset that I could not continue and had to be in kolkata but we ended with a proper dental status and discussion and with a plan in mind.

Dr. Shyam is my go to dentist whenever something happens with tooth. He is so patient, gentle, and caring. The way he explains and takes care of you during the entire procedure itself heals you 50%. He always prescribes medications only if they are essential, and that too by making sure that your body can handle it. 

He is simply awesome!

Dr.Shyam Padmanabhan was extremely caring in helping me understand the underlying issue. He was on time and addressed the issue in hardly 30 seconds.

Upon asking clarifications, he made sure that there are no questions unanswered that was running on the back of my mind. I am extremely satisfied with this consultation and would definitely visit in future and would also refer my networks for any dental treatment. He is not just a dentist but a true LEGEND within the dentist community.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Was new to the city and didn't know a good dentist, and the previous one wasn't a lot of help for my pain. Dr. Shyam was exceptional understanding and listened to the entire problem. His medications too, worked like magic. The entire procedure of scaling helped my Gingivitis heal and later I went for the extraction, which too was done under 5 mins without any discomfort, even after me being very anxious. 10/10 would recommend everyone!
reply_text: Thank you Shirin. Glad you had a pleasant experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Though my implants were fine, prosthetic work was not to my satisfaction. it had his own discomfort even after 10 months of getting the crowns fitted. when explained, the Doctor is more into lectures than solving my problem. They can solve if I redo it again and spend time and money. **** ** *** * ********* ****** Hence I don't recommend *** ********** *********
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback. We believe in making patients understand the procedures before we execute the treatment plan, as INFORMED DECISION and awareness is an important aspect of our policy (These are not lectures!!). We have NOT recommended any change of prosthesis and even if we do we would do it using our TIME and RESOURCES and not burden the patient. To err is human, but we do not hesitate to correct any of our errors (if any) with patients comfort, energy, time and money in mind.
Your complaints from the beginning were headache, neck pain and jaw discomfort unrelated to the current implants/ prosthesis.
You had already consulted other Dentists (for a second opinion) and got it certified from them, that the implant treatment was well and was good (as described by you). 
Even your Neurologist had given you clearance that your symptoms are NOT because of the Dental Implants.
Your treating Maxillofacial Prosthodontist and Implantologist has done a fine job and never was in doubt regarding the prosthesis. However, since you desired a change in Prosthesis he had given you various alternate treatment options. 
I request you to kindly read the alternate treatment options provided in depth and please let us execute the plan accordingly. Thank you.
